name: MoveDashboardTile
description:
Move a tile's position in a specific dashboard.

Use this tool to update the position of a tile within a specified dashboard environment in Datadog. This is useful when reorganizing dashboard layouts or customizing views.

parameters.name: dashboard_id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this dashboard within Datadog.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this dashboard.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the project you want to access. Retrieve it by calling the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Specifies the desired format of the response data. Options are 'json' or 'txt'.

parameters.name: dashboard_tile_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the tile update, including properties like id, name, and position within the dashboard.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this dashboard.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this dashboard.
